channel.title: Need help with source run.bat and a few other
channel.description: When I try and run the source a weird thing pops up and i am completely stumped, also i need help adding cache into the client and how to add my char file into the source, its a really really complicated 317 that my friend made and he quit and gave to me

item.title: Need help with source run.bat and a few other
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

If you want to add a character file to the source, you need to find the Characters directory, it might be saves, or anything depending on the layout of the source. But most 317s have it as Characters. Also, for the ‘weird error’ please post it.

It’s most likely to do with your JDK setup as more errors among this type are. For the client cache - make a topic in client help as this is for server help only.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with source run.bat and a few other
